group_1.textRight: Hello there, Kanagi! What do you recommend@I get today?

group_1.textLeft: The potatoes stewed in broth. The ingredients@and seasoning are superb.

group_1.textRight: [chara:800800:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Oh, yes! It looks delicious.

group_1.textLeft: We also have deep-fried meat skewers, hot@out of the fryer.

group_1.textRight: She does! I guess I'll have to buy some of@those, too.
Speaking of which! I heard that today's your@last day, is that true?

group_1.textLeft: Mm, indeed it is. My next job is already@lined up.

group_1.textRight: Then I won't be able to count on your meal@recommendations anymore...
One less thing to look forward to!
But I'm sure you'll do a wonderful job@wherever you work!
This old lady'll be cheering you on!
I must thank you for all your help while I@worked here, sir.

group_1.textLeft: I should say the same to you. Thanks for@everything... Really wish you could stay.

group_1.textRight: I don't know what I'm gonna do without@you around to help.
It was so reassuring to have you here...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, you're our main pillar of support.@It's gonna be tough without you.

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry to leave you. But I have to look@after my family.

group_1.textLeft: We can't match the salary your new place is@offering.

group_1.textRight: I know everyone's gonna count on you at@your new job, too, Kanagi!
But of course.
I'm home.

group_1.textLeft: Welcome home. You're back later than usual.

group_1.textRight: Today was my last day at the deli counter,@so they held a little farewell party for me.
They even gave me some presents.

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry to put you through all of this,@just because I can hardly work now.

group_1.textRight: Don't worry about me.
It's only natural I do what I can to help@the family.

group_1.textLeft: But your new job is completely different@from what you did before. I'm worried...

group_1.textRight: There's nothing to be concerned about.
It might be different from what I'm used to,@but the salary makes it worthwhile.
Which means I won't have to work two jobs.
I'll have more free time, and I can devote@myself to other important things.
There really are no downsides.

group_1.textLeft: I'm really grateful. You sure grew into a@wonderful young woman.

group_1.textRight: *Chuckle* I'm blessed with a great brother@and parents. I owe it all to you guys.
(I got a part-time job in the west that@pays really well...)
(I have to do my best at it, for my family.)
